Always remove Inject attribute with b:attr Browser Data Favicon Browser Mobile Navbar Color SEO Title Homepage Post / Pages Search Query Search Label Search Index Archive 404 404 | Page Not Found SEO Description Canonical URL Canonical for Pagination Homepage Block SE Robots on Page [Search Query / Label, Archive] Blog Feeds Meta OpenGraph Blog restricted Age disable cache turbo hotwire (fix render duplicate event) CSS External /* */ .CSS_LIGHTBOX { z-index:2000 !important } body#layout {min-width:768px;padding:100px 20px 0 !important;} body#layout .hidden, body#layout .invisible {display: inherit;} body#layout::before { content: "Template Mantul"; position: absolute; top: 20px; right: 27px; padding: 14px 22px; font-family: monospace; font-size: 18px; color: #3f51b5; background: #c8e7ff; border-radius: 2px 4px; border: 1px solid #3f51b5; } body#layout ul, body#layout ol { list-style:none } /* main */ body#layout #main-categories,body#layout #main-archive, body#layout #main-sidebar { width: 33.3%; float: left; } CSS Internal JS External JS Internal // // Google Analytics Schema (for SEO) [{"@context": "http://schema.org", "@type": "WebSite", "@id": "#website", "url": "", "name": "", "potentialAction": {"@type": "SearchAction", "target": "search?q={q}", "query-input": "required name=q"} } ,{"@context": "http://schema.org/", "@type": "Organization", "@id": "#organization", "name": "", "url": "", "logo": {"@type": "ImageObject", "url": "https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/ULB6iBuCeTVvSjjjU1A-O8e9ZpVba6uvyhtiWRti_rBAs9yMYOFBujxriJRZ-A=h60", "caption": ""} } ,{"@context": "http://schema.org", "@type": "WebPage", "@id": "#webpage", "url": "", "name": "", "description": "", "isPartOf": {"@id": "#website"} ,"primaryImageOfPage": {"@id": "#primaryimage"} } ,{"@type": "ImageObject", "@id": "#primaryimage", "url": "", "contentUrl": ""} ] true true 0 true true | Main Header https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-4fJRtABkhvw/X3moqzwjK1I/AAAAAAAABN0/3O7rqR0qsykjOpMpN4JNDOmKvqt8y5P4QCK4BGAYYCw/s60-p-k-no-nu/riedayme-logo-only.png 60 933 true false BEHIND 60 function googleTranslateElementInit() { new google.translate.TranslateElement({ pageLanguage: '', includedLanguages: "id,en,vi,zh-CN,th,ru,ms,ko,ja,it,hi,fr,es,de,ar,tr", autoDisplay: false, layout: google.translate.TranslateElement.InlineLayout.SIMPLE }, 'google_translate_element'); } Main Content 3 true true ALL_TIME Previous Next false Comment #ffffff true true #ffffff true #ffffff TextAndImage #ffffff On true 1x1 true false Similiar Topic true 1 false #ffffff false false this Comment Location setting (Embed, Full, Or Popup) new comment has disable from post setting (only work embed comment) commentPostEmbed don't remove class name or the comment can't work commentPostPopup commentPostFullPage this Comment Data only admin can insert link to comment remove reply button if comment size is 200 (its bug from blogger if you add reply comment then people go reply, the comment can't be show :( this for reply button Balas Reply this for reply formComment show paging if have 200+ comment : : :
